name: Witch Combat
description:
Every year, the witches of the Dark Lands go to competitions in battles to determine which of them is better, faster and stronger! Go on a journey, avoid dangerous obstacles, fight flying creatures, use magical powers to win.

Game features:
  • nice graphics in the style of the dark middle ages
  • 20 challenging levels of flying in a mortar and battles
  • random battle mode
  • 3 additional spells to help in battles and flights
